text: The Alliance Crusader is a combat ship manufactured by Lakon Spaceways, produced from 3304 to the present. It costs 25,367,279 CR and has an insurance value of 1,268,364 CR.

The Alliance Crusader has dimensions of 68.1m x 58.5m x 19.8m, with a hull mass of 500 t and an armour rating of 540. It features 3-4 pilot seats, supports multicrew, and includes a fighter hangar. Its shields are rated at 126 MJ, and it has a heat capacity of 316. The ship's fuel capacity is 16 t, with a cargo capacity of up to 122 t. Its manoeuvrability is rated at 3, with a top speed of 183 m/s (default) or 209 m/s (upgraded), and a boost speed of 305 m/s (default) or 348 m/s (upgraded). The unladen jump range is 8.21 ly (default) or 21.76 ly (upgraded).

The Alliance Crusader features 4x Utility Mounts, 3x Small Hardpoints, 2x Medium Hardpoints, and 1x Large Hardpoint. It has 1x Class 1 Compartment, 2x Class 2 Compartments, 2x Class 3 Compartments, 1x Class 5 Compartment, and 1x Class 6 Compartment. Additionally, it includes 3x Class 4 Military Compartments.

The Alliance Crusader's default outfitting includes Lightweight Alloys (Bulkhead, Class 1), Power Plant (Reactor Bay, Class 6), Thrusters (Class 6), Frame Shift Drive (Class 5), Life Support (Class 5), Power Distributor (Class 6), Sensors (Class 4), and Fuel Tank (Class 4). It also features Cargo Rack [x32] (Class 5), Shield Generator (Class 5), Supercruise Assist (Class 1), and (PAS) (Class 1).
